alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Richland; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:20PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Roosevelt, northeastern McCone, northeastern Dawson and Richland Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 619 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles east of Bredette to 10 miles northwest of Lambert. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Poplar, Culbertson, Fairview, Brockton, Bainville, Froid, Lambert, Bredette, Snowden, Fort Kipp, Enid, Nohly, Wooley, Fort Union, Crane, Sprole, Mccabe and Midway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Richland; Western Roosevelt
